definitions.definition: breed specimens of (a plant, animal, etc.) by natural processes from the parent stock.
examples: try propagating your own houseplants from cuttings

definitions.definition: (of a plant, animal, etc.) reproduce by natural processes.
examples: the plant propagates freely from stem cuttings

definitions.definition: spread and promote (an idea, theory, etc.) widely.
examples: the French propagated the idea that the English were violent and gluttonous drunkards
synonyms: promote; literarybruit abroad "a group that propagated extremist ideas"

definitions.definition: (with reference to motion, light, sound, etc.) transmit or be transmitted in a particular direction or through a medium.
examples: electromagnetic effects can be propagated at a finite velocity only through material substances
